title: Daniel Barenboim, a Towering Maestro Held Back by Illness
description: The pianist and conductor turns 80 soon, but deteriorating health has kept him from the celebrations he had long planned.
dc:creator: Javier C. Hernández
media:description: Daniel Barenboim, here conducting in Argentina in 2019, has been homebound in Berlin with what he has described as a “serious neurological condition.”
